charges.charge_description: AIDED AND ABETTED BY EACH OTHER, UNLAWFULLY, KNOWINGLY AND INTENTIONALLY DID POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE A CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE, WHICH OFFENSE INVOLVED A MIXTURE OR SUBSTANCE CONTAINING METHAMPHETAMINE, A SCHEDULE II CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE IN VIOLATION OF 21 USC 841(a)(1) AND 18 USC 2.
